attributes.action: Require all organisations using 0870/ 0845 numbers to provide a Geographical number with equal prominence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many organisations, both Public and Private Sector use 0870/ 0845 telephone numbers 'in the interwest of customer service'. These numbers are generally not included in inclusive telecoms package, resulting in high charges for users.

If these organisations were required to list a geographical number with the same prominence as the 0870 number then customers would have greater choice.
